About Me

My name is Ricardo Pietrobon and I am interested in big data and situated cognition applied to immersive distance education.

  • Basic skills for clinical researchers working with biomedical data
  • Complex Learning IDM, whole tasks, and task ladders
  • Learning Agile project management applied to clinical research
  • Enriched and personalized learning content
  • 3D models in healthcare education - bone fractures
